org.xmlunit.diff

接口 ComparisonFormatter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultComparisonFormatter

    public interface ComparisonFormatter
    Formatter methods for a Comparison Object.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getDescription(Comparison difference)
      Return a short String of the Comparison including the XPath and the shorten value of the effected control and test Node.
      String getDetails(Comparison.Detail details, ComparisonType type, boolean formatXml)
      Return the xml node from Comparison.Detail.getTarget() as formatted String.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDescription

        String getDescription(Comparison difference)
        Return a short String of the Comparison including the XPath and the shorten value of the effected control and test Node.

        This is used for Diff.toString().

        参数:
        difference - the comparison to describe
        返回:
        a short description of the comparison

      • getDetails

        String getDetails(Comparison.Detail details,
                  ComparisonType type,
                  boolean formatXml)
        Return the xml node from Comparison.Detail.getTarget() as formatted String.

        This can be used to produce a nice compare-View in your IDE (e.g. with org.junit.ComparisonFailure).

        参数:
        details - The Comparison.getControlDetails() or Comparison.getTestDetails().
        type - the implementation can return different details depending on the ComparisonType.
        formatXml - set this to true if the Comparison was generated with DiffBuilder.ignoreWhitespace().
        返回:
        the full xml node.
